SELECT A.P_NAME ,A.PRICE ,A.SALE_PRICE ,A.STOCK ,A.P_POINT ,A.P_DETAIL ,A.P_SMALL ,A.P_BIG ,A.P_MIDDLE ,A.P_SIZE ,A.P_CODE ,A.P_MAIN ,B.P_IMAGE_SRC FROM TC_PRODUCT A ,TC_P_FILE B WHERE A.P_MAIN like '베스트' AND ROWNUM <=10 AND A.P_CODE = B.P_CODE AND A.P_CODE = B.P_CODE

SELECT A.P_NAME ,A.PRICE ,A.SALE_PRICE ,A.STOCK ,A.P_POINT ,A.P_DETAIL ,A.P_SMALL ,A.P_BIG ,A.P_MIDDLE ,A.P_SIZE ,A.P_CODE ,A.P_MAIN ,B.P_IMAGE_SRC FROM TC_PRODUCT A ,TC_P_FILE B WHERE A.P_MAIN like '추천' AND ROWNUM <= 3 AND A.P_CODE = B.P_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TC_PRODUCT (P_CODE, P_NAME, P_DETAIL,PRICE,SALE_PRICE,STOCK,P_POINT, P_BIG,P_MIDDLE,P_SMALL,P_SIZE,P_MAIN) VALUES(#{pCode}, #{pName}, #{pDetail}, #{price}, #{salePrice}, #{stock}, #{pPoint} , #{pBig}, #{pMiddle}, #{pSmall}, #{pSize}, #{pMain})
mapper.select: SELECT A.P_NAME ,A.PRICE ,A.SALE_PRICE ,A.STOCK ,A.P_POINT ,A.P_DETAIL ,A.P_SMALL ,A.P_BIG ,A.P_MIDDLE ,A.P_SIZE ,A.P_CODE ,B.P_IMAGE_SRC FROM TC_PRODUCT A ,TC_P_FILE B WHERE A.P_CODE = B.P_CODE ORDER BY A.P_NAME DESC limit #{page}, 10

SELECT P_NAME ,PRICE ,SALE_PRICE ,STOCK ,P_POINT ,P_DETAIL ,P_SMALL ,P_BIG ,P_MIDDLE ,P_SIZE ,P_CODE FROM (SELECT rownum rn, P_NAME ,PRICE ,SALE_PRICE ,STOCK ,P_POINT ,P_DETAIL ,P_SMALL ,P_BIG ,P_MIDDLE ,P_SIZE ,P_CODE FROM TC_PRODUCT WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} ORDER BY P_NAME DESC ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum} ORDER BY P_NAME DESC
